com.mapbox.services.android.utils

Class PermissionsUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.utils.PermissionsUtils

  • public class PermissionsUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities to handle the new permission system in 6.0. Weonly focus on ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION. http://developer.android.com/training/permissions/index.html

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PermissionsUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void explainFallback(android.app.Activity activity) 
      static void explainFallback(android.app.Activity activity, java.lang.String message) 
      static boolean isLocationGranted(android.app.Activity activity)
      We only need to check for ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION as this implies ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION: http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/location/strategies.html#Permission https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/android-api/location?#location_permissions
      static boolean isRequestSuccessful(int requestCode, java.lang.String[] permissions, int[] grantResults) 
      static void startPermissionFlow(android.app.Activity activity) 
      static void startPermissionFlow(android.app.Activity activity, java.lang.String rationale)
